channel.title: Help With Something
channel.description:
Hey guys need help with 2 things.
1. a starter source? anyone know of a good one to use?
2. In the sources I've downloaded and tried to get up running to see whats on it i basically can't, either the compiler dont work or the run.bat or both. Basically its always been the compiler more often. I edit and change the code to my java i downloaded. I have variables setup but this is what it says when i compile.. [code] javac: file not found: src\server\event\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code] or[code] Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Can anybody help especially with starter source, i've not been around RSPS for bout 4 years so everythings completely different than what it used to be, was so much simpler back then :)

item.title: Help With Something
item.dc:creator: @mickie456 mickie456
item.description:
@mickie456 wrote:

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543647.msg3984764.html#msg3984764
not too bad source, just a clean pi with some features like hiscores

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Something
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Don’t use those newer shit 700+ sources. Stick with rs2 server like 317 and 474. You will gain more respect that way, along with it being easier to code.

Read full topic

item.title: Help With Something
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

  1. get Deltascape. XD or whatever you want, really. there’s plenty of good sources.

  2. change it some more. the first code is saying it can’t find your path, so just make it look like this. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp or whatever your direct path is. just take the “java” that’s there and make it the end of the path. add.exe to it, in other words.

the second part of that code is perfectly okay! it’s just saying some stuff is deprecated.

Read full topic

Hey guys need help with 2 things.

  1. a starter source? anyone know of a good one to use?
